document.full_text: after 15 years, ratko mladic, the former bosnian serb general accused of ordering the massacre of muslims in 1995, was captured. he will be sent to the hague for trial.
document.title: serbia says jailed mladic will face war crimes trial
lines_and_colors: after 15 years, ratko mladic, the former bosnian serb general accused of ordering the massacre of muslims in 1995, was captured. he will be sent to the hague for trial.
